Privacy Policy for Codex33

Last Updated October 21, 2023


Thank you for visiting Codex33's website. This Privacy Policy outlines how we collect, use, disclose, and protect your personal information. By using our website, you consent to the terms of this Privacy Policy.

1. Information We Collect

  • Personal Information:

    (a) We may collect personal information such as your name, email address, and contact details when you voluntarily provide them through forms or other interactive features on our website.

  • Non-Personal Information:

    (b) We may collect non-personal information, such as browser type, operating system, IP address, etc to enhance the functionality of our website and improve user experience.

2. How We Use Your Information

  • Personal Information:

    (a) We use personal information to communicate with you, provide information about our products or services, and respond to your inquiries.

  • Non-Personal Information:

    (b) Non-personal information is used to analyze trends, administer the site, track user movements, and gather demographic information for aggregate use.

3. Cookies and Similar Technologies

  • Cookies:

    (a) We may use cookies to enhance your experience on our website. You can adjust your browser settings to refuse cookies, but this may limit your access to certain features.

4. Information Sharing

  • Third-Party Service Providers:

    (a) We may share your information with third-party service providers who assist us in delivering our products and services. These providers are obligated to maintain the confidentiality of your information.

  • Legal Compliance:

    (b) We may disclose personal information to comply with legal obligations, protect our rights, and ensure the safety of our users.

5. Security

  • Security Measures:

    (a) We may update this Privacy Policy to reflect changes in our practices or for other operational, legal, or regulatory reasons. We encourage you to review this page periodically for the latest information.

6. Your Choices

  • Opt-Out:

    (a) You can opt-out of receiving marketing communications from us by following the instructions provided in such communications.

  • Access and Correction:

    (b) You may request access to, correction, or deletion of your personal information by contacting us through the information provided below.

7. Changes to this Privacy Policy

  • Updates:

    (a) We may update this Privacy Policy to reflect changes in our practices or for other operational, legal, or regulatory reasons. We encourage you to review this page periodically for the latest information.

Contact Information:

If you have any questions about these Privacy Policies, please connect with us. By using the Service, you agree to these terms and conditions. If you do not agree to these Privacy Policy, please do not use the Service. *Thank you for using CODEX33 Software Training Website!*
